roleset.name: look at
roleset.note: EYEBALL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'eyeball' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Scrutiny. (from eyeball.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: check it out
example.text: Apple Computer added that it-1 was being ``cautiously optimistic,'' despite [*-1] not yet closely eyeballing all of its 50 buildings in the region.
example.arg: all of its 50 buildings in the region
